title: [Alchemist, Sitting Room]
description: Two contoured sandstone chairs rest in this chamber, although one has been half-buried by the wreckage of the eastern wall.  Moonlight-silvered leaves spotted with the fanciful shapes of orchids can be seen through a wide zigzagging crack in the wall, making the striped sandstone look dingy by contrast.  Crumpled papers litter the ground.

Two contoured sandstone chairs rest in this chamber, although one has been half-buried by the wreckage of the eastern wall.  Bright green leaves spotted with brightly hued orchids can be seen through a wide zigzagging crack in the wall, making the striped green sandstone look dingy by contrast.  Crumpled papers litter the ground.
